entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 51 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 36.
